title: (MAC) Bugsplat before loading screen.
body: I'm tired of this bull. Every time I try to load into a game, right before it gets to the loading screen it crashes. I'm most likely going to get a ban for leaving games.. which is completely unfair. I've spent about $200 on skins for this game. I'd like some help, please.

replies.body: Also on mac. Crash while starting up the load screen every time since patching. Pure garbage.
You won't get any. Riot doesn't care. Trust me.
Riot also doesn't give a shit when people are unrightfully banned. It's not our fault that your patches are buggy as hell.

same here and im on pc bug splat... this 4.18 patch is so buggy...
